headline: 3 Reasons AIZ is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Assurant currently trades at $216 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a middling return of 1.7%. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 15.7% gain during that period.
